ValidationRule.description: MMS New Cadence requests must be submitted by an MMS District or Zone Sales Manager. For all other Touchpoint requests, please select Request Type: Tool Support with Sub-Type: Touchpoint.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.Name = 'Sales Help Request Case', ISPICKVAL(Type,'New Touchpoint Cadence'), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c,'MMS'), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'MMS Manager - SB')), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, 'System Admin')), ISNEW())
ValidationRule.errorMessage: MMS New Cadence requests must be submitted by an MMS District or Zone Sales Manager. For all other Touchpoint requests, please select Request Type: Tool Support with Sub-Type: Touchpoint.
